publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: this is given only to the superior person!”

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: and he may be said to kept his distance from meting out punishments and honorary titles.

sense.def: application of punishments and honorary titles

tls:text.tls:line: when outside one will show brotherly respect,

sense.def: show brotherly-affection-style care for the local people

tls:text.tls:line: and he never passed judgment, positive or negative, on others.

sense.def: any individuals; human individuals; person (as having it's own features)
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
"in every way, definitely": assertive combination of final particles
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb or adjective
子期似王"Ziqi resembled the king": look like; be similar in appearance
resemble (in essence), be alike
adapt to the prevailing dynamics of the situation
the true highest ruler
primal energies
sometimes (... at other times)

seg.line: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運

tls:text.tls:srcline: 天其或者將啟堯舜之運
tls:text.tls:line: Maybe Heaven will open up for a new turn as from Yáo and Shùn

sense.def: probably; in all likelihood; for all we know

tls:text.tls:line: That is surely a profound point!

sense.def: would it not V?

tls:text.tls:line: weren’t they profound!

sense.def: would it not V?

tls:text.tls:line: that must count as the most admirable.”

sense.def: be the most admirable

tls:text.tls:line: the superior person would cease to entertain these hopes (for a late revival of an imperial administrative system).

sense.def: innermost hope

tls:text.tls:line: and the petty man hopes for his (kind of) generous treatment (as evidenced in WT’s actions).

sense.def: hope

tls:text.tls:line: The Master travelled to a temple to Confucius.

sense.def: N is dedicated to Npr

seg.line: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。

tls:text.tls:srcline: 越公以《食經》遺子，子不受。
tls:text.tls:line: When Yuègōng (i.e. 楊素) presented his "Classic of Eating" to the Master, and the Master would not accept it, 【The reference to the leading disciple 楊素 in this way imitates the archaic ways of personal reference in the Analects that does persist in Suí dynasty times.】

sense.def: give (something) to (someone)

tls:text.tls:line: the capital resources in it are bound to be thereby ***reduced.” 【TW finds an aspect that might advise against Confucian leniency. The second point is thoughtful and original, but one is unsure how the point fits into the context.

sense.def: get reduced

tls:text.tls:line: “If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

sense.def: if contrary to fact

tls:text.tls:line: “If Dù Rúhuì 杜如晦 (AD 585-630, served under the Suí, then senior minister in the early Táng administration, often mentioned together with Fāng Yuánlíng 房元齡, famous scholar official who in the end failed to play any important role) had met ***the right enlightened king

sense.def: 其人"the right person": the right N; the right kind of N, the appropriate, the relevant, the suitable

tls:text.tls:line: then in the eyes of the the common people he would surely have become 'like Heaven’!”

sense.def: the common people

tls:text.tls:line: Are you going to destroy the ‘tradition of moral decency’?”

sense.def: archaic: traditional morality

tls:text.tls:line: He treated other people’s orphans like his own.” (己 npro(.adN))

sense.def: his own contextually determinate N

seg.line: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 士有靡衣鮮食而樂道者，
tls:text.tls:line: “For a scholar who wears fine clothes and eats rare dishes, for him then to take delight in the Way,

sense.def: extravagant; elaborately or extravagantly beautiful

tls:text.tls:line: Those ***who dote on the misfortune (of others) and yearn for (other people’s) disaster 【The reduplicated Chinese notion of Schadenfreude is interesting and important here.】

sense.def: longing for the misfortune of others; Schadenfreude

tls:text.tls:line: and moreover this is the public duty of an ordinary person.

sense.def: official duty

tls:text.tls:line: “Our Master transmits ***and creates the Great Moral Truth.

sense.def: lasting, permanent

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: gentlemanly, of the gentlemanly type 女為君子儒

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the superior man type.”

sense.def: characteristic of a true gentleman; in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: that is to be a person of the true gentleman type.”

sense.def: gentlemanly, of the gentlemanly type 女為君子儒

tls:text.tls:line: were what was the eccentric kind in ancient times:

sense.def: off-putting; eccentric; mad; unconventional

tls:text.tls:line: then they will say: ‘He still is our ruler.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: then they will say: ‘He is beyond the pale.

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: “This proper practice

sense.def: kind of behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: “Despising other creatures/people and setting high store by oneself

sense.def: oneself

tls:text.tls:line: Surely you speak with two tongues.”

sense.def: speak with two tongues; be dishonest; be hypocritical

tls:text.tls:line: “What Wèi Zhēng asked about are the external symptoms,

sense.def: material external appearance, material evidence

tls:text.tls:line: came to make things worse by pushing the waves to add to the flood:

sense.def: free flow

tls:text.tls:line: but their concrete practice was deceitful.

sense.def: behaviour in the past; record of actions in the past

tls:text.tls:line: but their concrete practice was deceitful.

sense.def: be deceitful

tls:text.tls:line: “When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,

sense.def: be standoffish

tls:text.tls:line: “When kept at a distance not to get standoffish,

sense.def: standoffishness

tls:text.tls:line: What about that kind of behaviour?”

sense.def: what about that? What do you think about that (the preceding, contextually determinate)?

tls:text.tls:line: “What is the point?”

sense.def: (often followed by 也：What is the point?

tls:text.tls:line: these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”

sense.def: distinguished (command etc)

tls:text.tls:line: these were the means by which one followed Heaven and paid homage to decreed fate.”

sense.def: blessed

tls:text.tls:line: nor does he pray for pointless good fortune

sense.def: pray for

tls:text.tls:line: nor does he pray for pointless good fortune

sense.def: hope for

tls:text.tls:line: That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!
That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!

sense.def: end up in, end up with

tls:text.tls:line: That is why they end with the catching of the unicorn!

sense.def: end up in, end up with

tls:text.tls:line: “Don't the Annals end-and-culminate in accordance with the Way of Heaven?!

sense.def: come to an end, finish; bring things to a close

tls:text.tls:line: That is why the superior person is well prepared for these.”

sense.def: a true gentleman; a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: These people maintained their stand to the end and were famous and beloved (of the people),

sense.def: famous position; political fame

tls:text.tls:line: “The filial ones according to our conception are different from this:
A follower asked the Master about this,

sense.def: consult (a person N2) about a determinate thing N1

tls:text.tls:line: “How true that is!

sense.def: be right, be true

tls:text.tls:line: is what ordinary people are bound to.”

sense.def: the numerous humans, the common registered and taxable people;

tls:text.tls:line: this to be responsible for what happens to one,
***put forward your good example;

sense.def: good way of doing things; proper method; good example

tls:text.tls:line: “To put up with a transgression from an honest fellow

sense.def: an insult

tls:text.tls:line: then the true king can ***organise the rites;

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: then the true king can create ritual music.” 【It is important to WT that the rules of ritual propriety as well as the celebratory court music owe their origin to propitious cosmological context: they are, as it were, not autonomous independent products human civilisation.】

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: In the teachings one can surely see the aspirations of the true king,

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:text.tls:line: If a true king emerges

sense.def: a king, kings, the hypothetical king in question 王者之後也 "was a descendent of a king"

tls:text.tls:line: If a true king emerges

sense.def: the true king

tls:text.tls:line: Wén Zhōngzǐ said:

sense.def: 子曰"He answered thus Alekseev: он сказал ему так:"

tls:text.tls:line: “How very much

the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: be hard to V, to be V-ed

tls:text.tls:line: the Way of the True King is hard to put into action! 【One might suspect 甚矣 of actually modifying only 難行. Note, moreover, that 難 standardly comes to indicate practical impossibility rather than mere difficulty.】

sense.def: 令行"orders got implemented": get acted on, get practiced; get implemented (ant. 廢 "be abandoned")

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: never at any time

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: be earnest with respect to; make an earnest effort in relation to

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: (archaic, dialect) this (as described/specified above)

tls:text.tls:line: has never until been preoccupied by anything other than this (the practice of the Way of the True King).

sense.def: often emphatic:this abstract thing; this event; this course of action; this point; nothing other than this

tls:text.tls:line: ***And so our aspiration has been the true Way. 【contrast RY: 志，記。 It appears some edition does have 誌 for 志. But I have not found that edition yet.】

sense.def: aspire to, have one's mind set on 志於

tls:text.tls:line: Where should I be picking out those Sovereign Guidelines from?
But when it came to the point of rise or fall

sense.def: juncture, point in time; period in time

tls:text.tls:line: “After the death of Confucius, ***does not the civilised culture now reside here ***with us?” 【1. This is the the immodest main message of the book, articulated here, for good reason, not by WT himself but in conversation among his senior disciples. In the Analects, it is Confucius himself who makes this politically blasphemic claim for himself. The megalomaniac WT makes the same claim for himself. This is the central message of WT. One notes that 朱熹 would not make this kind of claim.】

sense.def: this place

tls:text.tls:line: “After the death of Confucius, ***does not the civilised culture now reside here ***with us?” 【1. This is the the immodest main message of the book, articulated here, for good reason, not by WT himself but in conversation among his senior disciples. In the Analects, it is Confucius himself who makes this politically blasphemic claim for himself. The megalomaniac WT makes the same claim for himself. This is the central message of WT. One notes that 朱熹 would not make this kind of claim.】

sense.def: this [place]> here

tls:text.tls:line: When ancolytes asked the Master about ***his visit,

sense.def: retainer or follower staying with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: and the rest of the acolytes all wetted ***their lapels with tears.

sense.def: retainer or follower staying with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: “He must, before all else, have fair empathy!”

sense.def: fair empathy for others; non-discriminating considerateness; mindfulness of the concerns of others

tls:text.tls:line: even to the little boys and girls the Master was sure to show intimate concern; 【Interestingly, an advanced philologist has rewritten this plain phrase: 俞檄疑“必狎"为"不狎“之误（《诸子平议补录》卷十二）。

sense.def: little boy

tls:text.tls:line: and unifies the ultimate principles.

sense.def: archaic: unite

tls:text.tls:line: ”Dǒng Cháng becomes thoughtful when appropriate,

sense.def: as the times require; as appropriate to the (changing) occasions [cf. 以時行 "act in accordance with the (changing) times in Guanzi.]

tls:text.tls:line: ”Dǒng Cháng becomes thoughtful when appropriate,

sense.def: from time to time> sometimes; often; periodically; several times; at regular intervals; all the time

tls:text.tls:line: Someone asked about his way (philosophy of life).

sense.def: personal philosophy of life

tls:text.tls:line: “I am afraid that those who ***look at these things are a waste of one's time.” 【1. WT imagines his own behaviour being observed by others

sense.def: read the contextually determinate text

tls:text.tls:line: “I am afraid that those who ***look at these things are a waste of one's time.” 【1. WT imagines his own behaviour being observed by others

sense.def: To survey from above, synoptically and without attention to detail, taking in a scene in a sweep> to peruse a text in a cursory manner.

tls:text.tls:line: “What I have not pondered carefully I do not maintain;

sense.def: ponder precisely; assess carefully; to estimate precisely; assess objectively (not always just the extent of things)

tls:text.tls:line: and they will say to themselves>think:

sense.def: (inner monologue:) say to oneself that S; think that S 謀曰

tls:text.tls:line: that is the Way of the Yí barbarians.

sense.def: general: the barbarians

tls:text.tls:line: “He was a Rú of the superior-man type.

sense.def: characteristic of a true gentleman; superior; in modifying position 君子之道 [NOT: the Way of gentleman X]

tls:text.tls:line: then, in all humility, I got it right;

sense.def: read pú = 僕 I, your humble servant

tls:text.tls:line: How much more should we!” 【WT recommends the way of Sage to everyone in a way that differs interestingly from that in the Analects.】

sense.def: we

tls:text.tls:line: as the historical documentation and ***the (philological) commentaries won the day, the Way of the historians was betrayed.

sense.def: the proper way/art of proper (moralising and analysing) historiography

tls:text.tls:line: as the historical documentation and ***the (philological) commentaries won the day, the Way of the historians was betrayed.

sense.def: the proper way/art of proper (moralising and analysing) historiography

tls:text.tls:line: Who would then say it is not implemented?” 【WT identifies the true Way of politics as the implementation of the principles of family virtues in the political sphere. I suppose one might say that WT spells out what is enigmatically adumbrated in the famous “道不远人”（《礼记•中庸》）.】

sense.def: how? in what way

tls:text.tls:line: Who would then say it is not implemented?” 【WT identifies the true Way of politics as the implementation of the principles of family virtues in the political sphere. I suppose one might say that WT spells out what is enigmatically adumbrated in the famous “道不远人”（《礼记•中庸》）.】

sense.def: whoever?

tls:text.tls:line: and when in disagreement not to harm ***the opponent.”

sense.def: the other(s)

tls:text.tls:line: showed respectful care with respect of what they had never seen,

sense.def: never 未之V也 as a pattern tends to mean "have never Ved it"

tls:text.tls:line: As for someone who craftily goes against his leadership

sense.def: craftily; in a devious and fraudulent manner
